entry.title: TCODE：IDCNACCTBLN , debit & credit problem
entry.content:
Hi there , recently we found a bug about the Tcode "IDCNACCTBLN".

Here is the detail:

if I enter "company code" and "or account level hierarchy", then the result was correct.

 

but if I enter "company code" and "G/L account", then the result was not correct.

I'm so curious about this problem, somebody please help.

thanks

entry.title: indexserverについて推奨パラメータでないことが性能に与える影響はあるか？
entry.content:
SP1の以下のパラメータについて、現在の設定値が推奨値とは異なる値に設定されています。
・max_num_recompile_threads
→現在値：<PERSON_NAME kernel>、推奨値：<between 6 and 32>
・suspended_cursor_lifetime
 →現在値：720、推奨値：<between DIGITS and ZIPCODE>

つきましては以下をご教示いただけますでしょうか。
①この設定がindexserverのパフォーマンスにどの程度影響を与えているか
②パラメータの値を変更することでどのような効果があるか
③変更する必要がある場合、それぞれどの値を設定すればよいか


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Billing date determination on a manually entered billing plan line
entry.content:
Hi All,

After updating the Date Determination Rule in the billing plan, the new logic is not being applied to manually added billing plan lines. The requirement is for the billing date to always be 11 days after the “Settlement From” date. In the example shown in the screenshot, the billing date should be 12.12.2025, but the system still defaults it to 1.12.2025, which is the same as the “Settlement From” date.

I have attached:
1) Billing plan line 

2) Date rule determination config

Is there a way to achieve this using configuration?

 

Thanks.

entry.title: Billing date determination for manually entered billing plan line
entry.content:
After updating the Date Determination Rule in the billing plan, the new logic is not being applied to manually added billing plan lines. The requirement is for the billing date to always be 11 days after the “Settlement From” date. In the example shown in the screenshot, the billing date should be 12.12.2025, but the system still defaults it to 1.12.2025, which is the same as the “Settlement From” date.

Please refer to the screenshots.

entry.title: GTS HANA Manage Blocked Partners - SPL hits report
entry.content:
In the past we used GTS 11.0 and just moved to HANA.  

When exporting the SPL Hits report, it does not show the Name matches & Address Matches.  Is there any SAP note or enhancement available so that the report will include name & address matches?  Thanks.

entry.title: Can SAP HANA Calculation Views be used in SAP BW on HANA (not BW/4HANA)?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I will soon start working with a new customer whose system landscape is based on SAP BW on HANA (classic BW 7.x, not BW/4HANA).

In this context, I would like to ask whether the usage of SAP HANA Calculation Views is technically supported in an SAP BW on HANA environment.

In some scenarios, I need the flexibility of SQL to handle complex queries, multiple joins, conditional calculations, and performance-critical logic. In such cases, is it possible to build the model using SAP HANA Calculation Views and then consume them in BW via Open ODS Views or CompositeProviders?

I am aware that SAP recommends ADSOs and CompositeProviders for core BW modeling; however, I would really appreciate it if you could provide some clarification on the technical support status, known limitations, and real-life usage of Calculation Views in BW on HANA systems.

 

An example taken from a BW/4HANA environment

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: Cover Page Text not showing correct PO# when SAP creates Invoices in Mass
entry.content:
Hello Team,

We have as scenario for invoice creation that we need help with. 

1. When we create invoices manually via VF04 the cover page text always works just fine regarding the PO# . Here is what we are using for the cover page text: Inv &VBRK-VBELN& cust &KUAGV-NAME1& &ZZV3-BSTKD&. The field we utilize for PO# is "ZZV3-BSTKD".

2. This issue is when we have the invoices created automatedly via mass. If a customer has more than 1 invoice in the batch run, the 1st PO# is used for the rest of their invoices. See example below for a case.

 

Any ideas on a solution?

entry.title: How to copy route from sales order into delivery
entry.content:
Dear experts,

we have route deterination activated for delivery type via TCode 0VLK which is OK for 80% of the cases.

Now we want the system to copy the manual enterd route from sales order into the delivery instead of perform route determination but only if a specific shipping condition is given.

 

I hoped that I can manage this in copy control from Sales order into delivery by copying routine for delivery FV50C001.

Regrettable this will not help as it seems that the route determination within delivery type will be performed after this routine.

Does anyone has a hint or idea?

Thanks in advance.

Best regards

Patrick

entry.title: We encountered a JDBC connection failure in the SAP HANA database environment.
entry.content:
Hello everyone,
I'm encountering a JDBC connection failure in our SAP HANA database environment, and the core error logs are as follows:

(sockfd:403, channel:0x00007f44fb9d2c00, event:0x00007f5e43fdf340, part:62) connection failure. error(600):failed routed execution: routed connection is opened at the same node with anchor, error position:ptime/session/eapi/jdbc/Connection.cc:4374[54823]{-1}[-1/-1] 2025-12-15 17:02:38.711827 e EmbeddedAPI Connection.cc(00884) : anchor conn id mismatch between session: 300145 and sesctx: 338504

SAP HANA Database Version:  hana2.00.046
Network Architecture:  The HANA cluster uses a dual-node setup, with SR synchronization running between the primary and standby nodes.

entry.title: SAP BAdI ME_GUI_PO_CUST: How to Prevent '0' from Displaying in Custom NUMC Fields
entry.content:
I’m working on a line item enhancement for SAP Purchase Orders (eg: via BAdI ME_GUI_PO_CUST).
I’ve added custom fields of type NUMC (numeric character) to the screen.

The issue is: when the field is left blank by the user, it defaults to displaying a series of zeros (e.g. '0' ).

I’d like the field to appear empty (blank) instead of showing all zeros when no value is entered.

What’s the best way to achieve this?

Any advice or best practices would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance!

ABAP Development   SAP enhancement package for SAP ERP MM Purchasing  ABAP Development  #SAP MM #Enhancements

entry.title: SAP HANA SQL Script : substring the string
entry.content:
Hi experts,

 

How to save the part after the last '/' of string using SAP HANA SQL Script ?

For example,

1/22/333 , the part after the last '/'  is '333'.

1/22  -> '22'

1/22/333/4444  -> '4444'

 

Tks.

entry.title: How to view replicated workforce data (via MDI solution) in S/4 hana private cloud?
entry.content:
AIF monitoring logs tells - Technical data replication for workforce person XXXX is completed, however not able to find this workforce details.

We have not fully enabled Fiori, so how and where can we view this replicated workforce data? Is there any transaction or table, where we can view this workforce data?

entry.title: SAP HANA DB: Recommended OS Settings for RHEL 9
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I currently have a Red Hat Enterprise Linux for SAP Applications Premium subscription and I am preparing a system to install SAP HANA 2.0 on RHEL 9. When running subscription-manager repos --list, I can see only the NetWeaver repositories, and the SAP HANA repositories are not available 

Refering to sap note 3108302 prerequiste is to have Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 (RHEL 9) for SAP Solutions.

My question is if it possible to installe SAP HANA 2.0 on RHEL 9 with RHEL SAP Applications Premium subscription?

entry.title: Bulk upsert in SAP HANA
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I'm using mulesoft to perform bulk upsert in SAP HANA from a source table that has duplicate values, usually I expect to get a return of an array [1,1,1,1,...] but Im getting  [1,1,2,2,3,3,1,1,...]. Does anyone knows what 2 and 3 means?

entry.title: how can we manually maintain SOD in S4 hana without GRC/third party tools.
entry.content: How can we manually maintain SOD in S4 Hana 2022 without GRC/third party tools. Please share any report, documents or videos available?

entry.title: Cross-company stock transfer order（STO）Commitments
entry.content:
Dear expert

We are facing an issue:

When I create Cross-company stock transfer order, the commitment value update, but the stock transfer purchase requisition create the commitment document and the value is zero.
It's so strange refer to the explanation for Question 7 in Note 459509:  Normally, Stock transfer requisition and stock transfer order will not update commitment.

However，we never implement BADI ME_COMMITMENT_STO_CH from 604033 and 2831505.

Cross-company stock transfer order account assignment is related to WBS.

po：

the system Product Version is S4HANA ON PREMISE 2022.

Thank!

Please provide the Programming language details.

Thanks in advance

entry.title: Negative stock in WM
entry.content:
Hey everyone!

I recently encountered a problem where I have negative stock in WM, but I don't have the opposite, which would be positive stock to correct this. In SAP MM, I also don't have this balance. So, basically, I have a material/batch that is negative in WM, and I can't move it to any other location or correct it.

From what I understand, the problem occurred because one of the custom movements within SAP was made in a warehouse that wasn't apparently configured. This material was registered with SM and then reversed with EM. In SAP MM, it occurred as expected. However, in SAP WM it didn't. Only the negative stock remains.

Has anyone else experienced this problem? Do you know how to fix it?
